SKUInfo.Name: The Classic Mom Gift Set

Description:
African Black Soap Gift W/Purchase

Indulge her with The Classic Mom Gift Set featuring best-sellers from our African Black Soap collection and our cosmetics line. This quintessential gift set is sure to keep her skin and hair luminous, healthy and soft. And, to be sure she is perfectly primped for all her big days or every day, included is our Sonia Lip Crayon, the perfect plummy brown, Lea Lip Gloss, an on-trend coral, and our essential Face Primer. Products in this gift set, made from our Grandma Sofia's century-old recipes, are lovingly formulated with certified organic Shea Butter ethically sourced from seven women's co-ops in Northern Ghana, as part of our Community Commerce Program.

This amazing collection includes:

An assortment of our best-selling hair and body products

  • African Black Soap Body Wash - 13oz
  • African Black Soap Lotion - 13oz
  • African Black Bar Soap - 8oz
  • African Black Soap Deep Cleansing Shampoo - 12oz
  • African Black Soap Balancing Conditioner - 12oz
  • African Black Soap Purification Masque - 12oz
  • African Black Soap Dandruff & Dry Scalp Elixir - 4oz

SheaMoisture Cosmetics

  • Sonia Lip Crayon - 0.10 oz
  • Lea Lip Gloss -0.23 oz
  • Primer - 1.7 fl oz

Complementary bag

  • Laser Cut Handbag - Black and Light blue - L: 15" H: 10" W: 4"
Quantities are limited
Keywords: Mother's Day Gifts, Gifts, Gift with purchase, African Black Soap
ExtraField11:
The Classic Mom Gift Set is rated 5.0 out of 5 by 1.
Rated 5 out of 5 by KLowry from Thank you, a thousand times, thank you! Thank you again for making such wonderful products with factors that are super important to me, such as no animal testing, organic, sustainable, and fair trade! And even better, free from garbage that's unhealthy additives found or even hidden in most products these days, even better is that you make this information easily available to find! All of this makes your products superior! (As someone who is very aware of all of these factors regarding the contents of products now, after having survived a year of chemo, you can bet I will be suggesting your products to my oncologist.) A friend of mine who lives in another state sent this to me as a surprise gift for my birthday. Everything in it has been just absolutely amazing and the purse is gorgeous! Your products are so wonderful! They're luxurious, indulgent, and affordable, all of which I definitely needed without realizing it! I'm an absolute convert to your products and will be acquiring more as needed. So very much looking forward to trying more things you offer! As a busy mom, these help with reinforcing I need some me time on occasion, without taking the time out to go to a spa! Thank you again!

SKUInfo.Name: Salon Professional Cocoshea Biolipid Complex™ Rehydrating Cocktail Mix

Description:
Smooth Finish Recovery Cocktail Mix There's no one-size-fits-all treatment when it comes to hair. Different textures have different care and styling needs. Most popular hair typing systems categorize textures by curl pattern:
Straight - Type 1, Wavy - Type 2, Curly - Type 3 and Kinky - Type 4, and then sub-categorize into: Fine/Thin - a, Medium - b, Thick/Coarse - c. Crate an artisanal experience for your client's unique hair texture and condition with a customizable cocktail mix specially formulated to ensure curly or coily hair always looks its best.
Non-professionals should feel free to experiment with the ratios in these cocktails. Once you get comfortable mixing and matching various hair products, you'll wonder why you ever relied on any bottled formula as is.
Discover the difference natural science makes to curly hair. Our proprietary Cocoshea Biolipid Complex helps define and lengthen even the tightest curls to reduce shrinkage. Natural lipids sheathe hair strands to help block humidity. This deep conditioning treatment rehydrates and helps restore natural barrier function to help the hair while fortifying its protective surface layer. Certified organic Shea Butter, Cupuau Butter and Black Seed Oil help nourish and add luxurious suppleness and shine to curly or coily hair, while Agave Nectar helps reduce frizz. Breathe new life and movement into dull frizzy curls with our REHYDRATING HAIR MASQUE.
ExtraField7:
• Agave Nectar: Delivers body and soft hold to hair while improving overall hair health.
  • Black Seed Oil: Restores moisture to hair and helps to strengthen.
  • Shea Butter: Deeply moisturizes while conditioning hair & scalp.
  • Cupuau Butter: Helps to smooth and soften hair, while restoring moisture and elasticity.
  • Coconut Oil: Able to penetrate the hair shaft to add strength and shine to frizzy, dry hair. Helps reduce friction to untangle knots and reduce breakage.

SKUInfo.Name: Salon Professional Baotein Precious Oils Complex™ Recovery Cocktail Mix

Description:
Vibrant Color Recovery Cocktail Mix There's no one-size-fits-all treatment when it comes to hair. Different textures have different care and styling needs. Most popular hair typing systems categorize textures by curl pattern:
Straight - Type 1, Wavy - Type 2, Curly - Type 3 and Kinky - Type 4, and then sub-categorize into: Fine/Thin - a, Medium - b, Thick/Coarse - c. Create an artisanal experience for your client's unique hair texture and condition with a customizable cocktail mix special formulated for color treated hair. Non-professionals should feel free to experiment with the ratios in these cocktails. Once you get comfortable mixing and matching various hair products, you'll wonder why you ever relied on any bottled formula as is.
Discover the difference natural science makes to color treated hair. Our proprietary natural Baotein Precious Oils Complex replenishes moisture and aids recovery of strength and elasticity. This deeply conditioning treatment rehydrates the hair shaft while restoring a natural lipid barrier and fortifying hair's protective surface layer. Certified organic Shea Butter and other natural ingredients help nourish and adds luxurious softness, suppleness and shine to color-treated hair. Natural plant-based sun filters help prevent fading.
ExtraField7:
• Tsubaki Oil: Hydrates and protects against free radical damage. High Oleic Fatty Acid content.

  • Shea Butter: Deeply moisturizes while conditioning hair & scalp.

Our perfecting face palette contours and sculpts to highlight your natural features. Helps to cover dark marks, vitalego, rosacea, tattoos and more. Formulated with natural ingredients and blended with nourishing Shea Butter, antioxidant-rich Vitamin E and oil controlling Corn Starch. Easy to apply with fingers or spatula (included). To complete the look, finish with PRESSED POWDER. Additional empty compact included.
Keywords: Contouring
ExtraField7: Key Ingredients: Nourishing Shea Butter, antioxidant-rich Vitamins E and oil controlling Corn Starch. Does NOT contain: Parabens, Talc, Gluten, Sulfates, Silicone, Phthalates, Mineral Oil and Synthetic Fragrance. Hypoallergenic. Noncomedogenic. Dermatologist Tested.
ExtraField8:
To find your perfect palette, match the medium swatch inside to your natural skin tone. Blend with the light and dark swatches for an unlimited range of shades. Pair with any SheaMoisture MINERAL BLUSH and PRESSED POWDER (not included) for an all-over expert look.

FOR EXPERT APPLICATION:

  1. Start with a clean, dry face. For best results, apply your moisturizer and primer prior to use.
  2. Scoop out a small amount of the medium tone with the spatula. Dab on the back of your hand (as a canvas for blending) or directly on the area you want to cover.
  3. Mix in the lighter and darker tones until you reach your perfect shade.
  4. Blend outwardly, using fingertips or foundation brush, over the desired area. Continue to build and blend until coverage is complete.
  5. Maximize and set coverage by finishing with your shade of PRESSED POWDER
  6. Accentuate the look with your MINERAL BLUSH

SKUInfo.Name: SheaMoisture Cosmetics Daily Moisture Renewal Vitamins - 30 ct.

Description:
Scientifically formulated to maintain healthy skin for youthful, ageless beauty. Created to stimulate cellular growth and renewal for a fresh, glowing complexion, this blend also boosts skin cells antioxidant defenses against the damaging effects of free radicals. And, like everything we do, the exclusive blend is made with Shea Oil, plus Olive Leaf, Aloe Vera, and other good-for-you ingredients. Vegetarian capsules to be taken by mouth as a dietary supplement.

  • Promotes healthy hair, skin and nail growth.
  • Contains 30 vegetarian capsules.
  • Supports beauty from the inside out.
Keywords: Vitamins
ExtraField7: • Key Ingredients: Shea Oil Seed, Baobab, Olive Leaf, Aloe Vera, Coconut, Green Tea Extract and Vitamins A, C, D & E.

VITAMIN A, VITAMIN C, VITAMIN D, VITAMIN E, NIACIN, MAGNESIUM, GREEN TEA LEAF EXTRACT, COQ10, DHA COMPLEX POWDER FROM ALGAE, FLAX SEED OIL POWDER. SHEAMOISTURE PROPRIETARY BLEND: ALOE VERA LEAF, COLLAGEN, MANGO FRUIT, PALM OIL SEED, COCONUT FRUIT, HONEYSUCKLE LEAF, OLIVE LEAF, ROSEMARY LEAF, COCOA BEAN, FENNEL SEED, SHEA OIL SEED, BAOBAB FRUIT, ORGANIC SPROUTED QUINOA AND RESVERATROL. OTHER INGREDIENTS: CAPSULE (CELLULOSE, WATER) CELLULOSE, SILICA, MAGNESIUM STEARATE, AND VANILLA EXTRACT

SKUInfo.Name: SheaMoisture Cosmetics Evening Sleep Supplement

Description:
This full spectrum formula gives you nutrient-rich skin overnight the prime time for the cellular growth and renewal for a youthful, rejuvenated appearance. Formulated with Biotin to promote healthy hair, skin and nail growth, plus Melatonin and Vitamins B-6 and B-12 to rejuvenate your whole body with true beauty sleep. And, like everything we do, this exclusive blend is made with Shea Oil, plus Olive Leaf, Aloe Vera, and other good-for-you ingredients.

  • Promotes healthy hair, skin and nail growth.
  • Contains 30 vegetarian capsules.
  • Supports a deep relaxing sleep.
Keywords: Vitamins
ExtraField7: Shea Oil Seed, Biotin, Baobab, Olive Leaf, Aloe Vera, Coconut and Vitamins B-6 & B-12.
ExtraField8: Suggested use: As a dietary supplement, adults take one (1) vegetarian capsule twenty (20) minutes before bedtime or as directed by a health care professional. Do not exceed one (1) capsule per twenty-four (24) hour period. Store in a cool, dry place and away from direct light. Keep out of reach of children.

Dry, rough and unmanageable curls can turn the best of days into a bad hair day. Protect your hair with SheaMoistures High Porosity Moisture-Seal Masque formulated using ultra-hydrating Mongongo and Hemp Seed Oils to transform porous, over processed , damaged hair into soft, smooth, frizz-free curls and coils.

In search of so-called holy grail products and products that give my hair long-lasting moisture, I have tried sooooooo many products from many different brands: Shea Moisture, Kinky Curly, Design Essentials, Cantu, DevaCurl, Obia, Naturalicious, Jane Carter, Eden Body Works, Trader Joe's, Aubrey Organics, Mizani, Taliah Waajid, etc., etc. I found several products that did a good job. While other naturals have raved about several Shea Moisture products, I generally have found them to be fine but nothing to rave about. I tried the Shea Moisture JBCO mask. It was fine. I tried the Shea Moisture Manuka line's mask. It was fine. Then . . . then I tried the Shea Moisture High Porosity Moisture-Seal Masque. Oh. My. The first time I used it I stepped in the show, saturated my hair with water, washed my hair with Naturalicous clay shampoo (kinky line), and then applied the SM hipo masque liberally to my hair. CategoryList.CategoryName: High Porosity - Mongongo Hemp Seed Oils
High Porosity - Mongongo Hemp Seed Oils

Description:
Dont you hate waking up to dry, messy, tangled curls? Frizzy curls can make your hair look damaged and unmanageable. SheaMoistures High Porosity Moisture-Seal Finishing Elixir has been formulated using ultra-hydrating Mongongo and Hempseed Oils to make your hair shine even on the days between two washes.
High Porosity hair is moisture resistant, brittle and easily breakable. The split ends are a result of open hair cuticles which lose moisture almost as soon as it is absorbed. This damages your curls and makes your curls and coils look like a rough, tangled, unmanageable mess. SheaMoistures High Porosity Moisture-Seal Finishing Elixir is infused with enriching Mongongo and Hempseed Oils which seals in moisture by closing hair cuticles leaving you with smooth, manageable curls which shine.
Natural ingredients like fortified Baobab Proteins and Apple Cider Vinegar are blended together with certified organic Shea Butter to make SheaMoistures High Porosity Moisture-Seal Finish Elixir the perfect spray to instantly hydrate your highly porous curls and make your hair smooth and lustrous.
Know your porosity, transform your hair! SheaMoistures High Porosity Moisture-Seal Finishing Elixir works best in combination with SheaMoistures High Porosity Moisture-Seal Shampoo or Co-Wash.

CategoryList.CategoryName: High Porosity - Mongongo Hemp Seed Oils

Description:
Rough, tangled and damaged curly hair is never pretty. SheaMoistures High Porosity Moisture-Seal Styling Gel is specially formulated with Mongongo and Hemp Seed Oils to tame wild, frizzy curls to give you a silky-smooth style you can rock with.
Styling high porosity hair is not easy. Low moisture retention caused by split ends make curls rough, frizzy and easily prone to breakage. Trying to force coarse curls into submission makes them look even more frazzled and damaged. SheaMoistures High Porosity Moisture-Seal Styling Gel is enriched with ultra-hydrating Mongongo and Hempseed oils which seal hair cuticles to block humidity and frizz to give you shiny, smooth, perfect curls.
Fortified with natural ingredients like Baobab Proteins and Apple Cider Vinegar, SheaMoistures High Porosity Moisture-Seal Styling Gel enhances natural shine of your curls and helps you keep frizz in check by smoothening rough hair cuticles. Certified organic Shea Butter present in this gentle styling gel, nourishes your curls without weighing them down, leaving you with frazzle free, dazzling curls and coils all day long.
Know your porosity, transform your hair! SheaMoistures High Porosity Moisture-Seal Styling Gel equalizes hair porosity and seals in moisture to give you perfectly styled, shiny and bouncy curls.

Rated 5 out of 5 by Elysa from Amazing for sensitive skin! My skin is very dry, very sensitive, and I'm allergic to sulfates. Needless to say, this body wash has been a god send for my cranky, irritated skin. It not only smells wonderful, but it has soothes my stressed out skin, leaving it soft and moisturized. I don't know how I ever lived without this bodywash, but I don't ever plan to again! In response to a previous review regarding the lack of suds: The lack of suds in this product is a GOOD THING! Sulfates are a synthetic, sulfer-based chemical compound derived from petrolium products, which act as a surfactant. This creates the suds and foam we've been conditioned to expect from bodywash and soap. Sulfates are a know skin irritant, strips the skin of natural oil, and also suspected to be a carcinogen. You won't get big, billowy clouds of suds with this product. What you will get is unbelievably happy skin. It is definitely worth the trade off!

SKUInfo.Name: "LOC" with Shea -  Extreme Moisture Bundle With Raw Shea Elixir

Description:
Our EXTREME MOISTURE BUNDLE WITH RAW SHEA ELIXIR is the perfect LOC bundle for very, very dry, curls and coils. Our best selling Raw Shea Elixir is infused Sea Kelp to smooth hair cuticles and with Argan Oil. Avocado Oil, Castor oil and high grade organic Fair Trade Shea Butter making it perfect for thicker strands requiring a heavier oil.


WHEN TO USE
Incorporate into your regular hair care routine our LOC WITH SHEA - EXTREME MOISTURE BUNDLE WITH RAW SHEA ELIXIR. Apply this moisture bundle using the LOC method to achieve long lasting moisture, reduce breakage and promote healthier, stronger curls and coils.

THE LOC METHOD
The LOC Method is the process of applying specific products - Leave-in, Oil & Cream (LOC) - to your hair in a specific order. The process begins with the application of a leave-in conditioner or lotion, followed by a natural oil and then ends with the application of a cream.
LEAVE-IN, OIL & CREAM (LOC) WITH SHEAMOISTURE
LEAVE-IN (L): Jamaican Black Castor Oil Strengthen, Grow & Restore Leave-In Conditioner
A reparative leave-in conditioner that softens and detangles hair. Nourishes, moisturizes and supports elasticity so hair resists breakage when detangling. Conditioners provide a protective layer that improves the appearance of split ends. Peppermint oil stimulates the scalp for an invigorating experience.
OIL (O): Raw Shea Butter Reconstructive Finishing Elixir
SheaMoisture's Raw Shea Butter Reconstructive Finishing Elixir conditions dry, damaged hair and controls frizz while adding brilliant shine.
CREAM (C): Coconut & Hibiscus Curl Enhancing Smoothie
SheaMoisture's Coconut & Hibiscus Curl Enhancing Smoothie defines curls, reduces frizz and smoothes hair for a soft, silky feel. Restores moisture, creates brilliant shine and conditions hair without weighing it down for bouncy, healthy curls. - Made with natural and certified organic ingredients. - Coconut Oil hydrates and protects hair while reducing breakage. - Silk Protein smoothes hair for a soft, silky feel. - Neem Oil controls frizz while adding brilliant shine.
Keywords: Hair Styler, Leave In

Rated 5 out of 5 by Dry Hair from This stuff is great! So I have straight, but fluffy, Native American-mix hair. It's a horribl hair type to maintain at shoulder length as it is thick and prone to getting greasy and matty, but also knots up as the strands are naturally dry deep inside. Any cleansers whatsoever leave my hair a tangled mess. Even Shea Moisture does if lathered too much in the wrong spot. However, the Shea Butter and Community Commerce Intense Moisture Shampoo were my "best bets" for cleaning. Yet they left my hair heavy with crunch and oil. I decided try this new Dandruff formula as I have dry scalp and dandruff. It rocks! It also made my dandruff and dry scalp vanish on the very first wash, and feels refreshing on the head. If you lather too much, it can dry my hair out, so I scrub my scalp with it, then use the Shea Butter or Community Commerce Intense on my lengths if need be; I have a complex hair type though, and this combo works. This shampoo helps clarify almos like no other Shea Moisture shampoos do. It's a must for those with dirty, grimey, flakey roots and/or straight hair. But do keep in mind that your ends and middles may require the touch of a more moisturizing shampoo like the Shea Butter version. Rated 4 out of 5 by Kelz from Not Spectacular, But Good I've only used it once, but I am anxious to use it again. Extremely thick, spreads easily, clean smell, penetrates hair, moisturizes. But after I sat with a thermal cap for 40 minutes, my hair was muuuch softer, clean, and moisturized down to the ends. My hair was extremely shrunken and tangled before I used this masque, and it made a huge difference in my hair without me even detangling it. The only cons are I wish it detangled a little better (although that's probably because my hair was really shrunken) and wasn't so weightless. Overall, it does everything it claims to do and I know this actually penetrated my strands (rather than just softening) based on how long it took to soften, so I will be using it again.
